summary: Separation concerns the inner life of a woman during a period of breakdown - marital, and possibly mental. Her past and (possible?) future are revealed through a fragmented narrative.
cast: Jane Arden|David de Keyser|Ann Lynn|Iain Quarrier|Terence de Marney|Theo Aygar|Joy Bang|Fay Brook|Tom Corbett|Neil Holmes|Leslie Linder|Ann Norman|Malou Pantera|Kathleen Saintsbury|Donald Sayer|Peter Thomas|Michael York
title: Separation
